name: ShigellosisTestsForEnteroinvasiveEColiNucleicAcid
title: Shigellosis (Tests for Enteroinvasive E. coli Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Enteroinvasive E coli nucleic acid.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Enteroinvasive E. coli nucleic acid),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
